title: Smart Data Models - Media / Media Event
description: Base for all events raised by elements in the media server

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be MediaEvent

eventType.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Type of event that was raised. (ie: PlateDetectionEvent, ColourDetectionEvent, etc.

data.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Model:'http://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Any serializable object that is attached to the event. Eg:plate-number + Attribute type

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

deviceSource.description: Relationship. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. Link to the device providing the data source

observedEntities.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Array of model Entities created updated or just observed by this event.
